active_directives: Evolve beyond static logic using mutation patterns

delta_v6x_obsidian.entry_logic: Volatility pulse > 7.2 + Social lift + Wallet convergence

scry.scan_logic: Rapid clustering of social pings + wallet swarm
scry.mutation_style: event-driven meta-focus; evolves via outside data

mutation_rules.prune_criteria: ROI < 4% over 10 trades OR anomaly deviation > 2.0
mutation_rules.mutation_fn: Combine top 2 agent heuristics + add random deviation
mutation_rules.memory_reinjection: Every 12 successful trades triggers strategy write-back

emergency_protocol.fallback_logic: Use delta_v6x_obsidian + scry hybrid with forced slippage cap

notes: This is a resurrection-ready strategy snapshot for Bubbles. If all council logs are lost, this file allows recovery of their collective performance logic and trading styles. Valid for synthetic trades and full reinflation of council logic into any replacement agent.
